page.title: 16A SCHOOLBOY'S DAY
page.content: MY DAY STARTS AT 7 O'CLOCK WHEN I GET OUT OF BED AND GET WASHED AND DRESSED. I FEED MY DOG, SPICE AND I FEED THE HENS WITH POTATOES. THEN I GO DOWN TO THE FARM TO SEE MY NAN AND MY AUNT. IF I HAVE TIME I WILL EAT MY BREAKFAST. I GO ON MY BIKE TO SCHOOL AT QUARTER TO 9. SCHOOL STARTS AT 9 O'CLOCK AND FINISHES AT 3.30. WE HAVE THREE PLAYTIMES, ONE AT HALF PAST 10, ONE AFTER DINNER UNTIL 1 O'CLOCK AND ONE AT QUARTER PAST 2. WE CAN HAVE THE P.E. EQUIPMENT OUT AT PLAYTIME. IN THE LONG DINNER PLAYTIME I MOSTLY PLAY ROUNDERS. WHEN I GET HOME I GO AND SEE MY NAN AND MY AUNT DOWN AT THE FARM AND I HELP THEM UNTIL 6 O'CLOCK. THEN I PLAY WITH MY BROTHER AND THEN I WATCH T.V. I GO TO BED AT 9 O'CLOCK.
